result.reason: Enhancing default external tools improves the out-of-the-box experience by ensuring essential tools like Ping and Traceroute are readily available.
result.approach: Modify ExternalAppsLoader.cs to check for and add missing default external tools (Ping, Traceroute, cmd, etc.) during application startup, ensuring they are present even if the configuration file already exists.
